images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, 19-year-old Japanese gravure idol engaging in a flirtatious shopping haul pose in a gym, her flawless skin texture revealing visible pores and faint vellus hair under the glow of handheld sparklers. The scene is set during the blue hour with underexposed low-key color grading, creating a moody yet clear atmosphere. Captured with a Sony A7R IV and an 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, the background features a blurred gym mirror reflecting the neon city lights, utilizing depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination for a cinematic, viral Instagram aesthetic.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
